Container.Name: PodFetch
Container.Description: [b]Description[/b][br] PodFetch is a free, web-based Podcast server, which allows to download podcasts from Rss feeds, iTunes and.PodIndex. It also contains a configuration for Single Sign On(SSO) and GPodder synchronization, allowing you to login via AntennaPod and enjoy a synchronized listening experience between the browser and your phone. So just grab your phone, start listening your favorite podcast and once your back at your Laptop you can continue right where you stopped.[br][br] [b]Configuration[/b][br] [b]/db[/b] This is where the application stores it SQLite database.[br] [b]/podcasts[/b] This is where all the podcasts are saved locally.[br][br] [b]Documentation[/b][br] https://github.com/SamTV12345/PodFetch/wiki[br][br]

Config.Name: Server URL
Config.Description: Url to your PodFetch server instance

Config.Name: Podcast path
Config.Description: Path where your podcasts are saved

Config.Name: Enable gPodder Integration
Config.Description: Allow gPodder sync with apps such as AntennaPod

Config.Name: Behind Reverse Proxy
Config.Description: Indicates if the server is behind a reverse proxy

Config.Name: Basic auth
Config.Description: Indicates if present that basic auth should be added

Config.Name: Oidc auth
Config.Description: Indicates that OIDC auth should be used

Config.Name: OIDC authority
Config.Description: The url of the OIDC authority.

Config.Name: OIDC client id
Config.Description: Client id of the oidc client. Note that this is a public client without a secret

Config.Name: OIDC Redirect URI
Config.Description: Redirect URI of PodFetch. This is normally your server url variable + /ui/login
